name: NSComboBoxDelegate
desc: A set of optional methods implemented by delegates of combo box objects.

items.name: func comboBoxSelectionDidChange(Notification)
items.desc: Informs the delegate that the pop-up list selection has finished changing.

items.name: func comboBoxSelectionIsChanging(Notification)
items.desc: Informs the delegate that the pop-up list selection is changing.

items.name: func comboBoxWillDismiss(Notification)
items.desc: Informs the delegate that the pop-up list is about to be dismissed.

items.name: func comboBoxWillPopUp(Notification)
items.desc: Informs the delegate that the pop-up list is about to be displayed.
